chinese: 芃芃棫樸。薪之槱之。濟濟辟王。左右趣之。
english: Abundant is the growth of the yu and the pu,Supplying firewood; yea, stores of it.Elegant and dignified was our prince and king;On the right and the left they hastened to him.

chinese: 濟濟辟王。左右奉璋。奉璋峩峩。髦士攸宜。
english: Elegant and dignified was our prince and king;On his left and his right they bore their half-mace [libation-cups]; -They bore their instruments with solemn gravity,As beseemed such eminent officers.

chinese: 淠彼涇舟。烝徒楫之。周王于邁。六師及之。
english: They rush along, - those boats on the Jing.All the rowers labouring at their oars.The king of Zhou marched on,Followed by his six hosts.

chinese: 倬彼雲漢。為章于天。周王壽考。遐不作人。
english: Vast is that Milky Way,Making a brilliant figure in the sky.Long years did the king of Zhou enjoy; -Did he not exert an influence upon men?

chinese: 追琢其章。金玉其相。勉勉我王。綱紀四方。
english: Engraved and chiselled are the ornaments;Of metal and of jade is their substance.Ever active was our king,Giving law and rules to the four quarters [of the kingdom].
